name: Lite Runner
description:
Lite Runner is a very small game made for the 7DRL game jam with an arcade approach. Overall the game is 'finished' but very shallow in terms of maps and items. 

Eat pellets to gain points, eat energizers to make enemies vulnerable to attack. Points may be spent on upgrades or saved for a better high score.

To say this game was rushed would be an understatement, if (and when) you find any bugs I would prefer you to message me directly. You may also email me SoftwareMoth@gmail.com.

You can also message me on twitter  @MothInteractive

CONTROLS

MOVEWASD/JOYSTICK/D-PAD
